Comments.T: This report skin generates a comprehensive cross-referenced and indexed narrative style HTML report over multiple pages. The report is designed to show all data held in a GenoPro file. Content includes but is not limited to pages for each individual and family, photos, 'tree' format indexes, timelines for events, SVG and PDF representations of GenoMaps, Google Maps of places, ancestor and descendant pedigree charts. ** Note that the web pages are intended to be served via web server such as familytrees.genopro.com\ via HTTP or HTTP protocols. Click on the other tabs above to choose the settings required. Each collection of settings can be saved in a named profile using the buttons below.

StyleSheet.O1: Default_2:Default theme with icon buttons for top menu and rounded corners on index and pop-up frames
StyleSheet.O2: Default_3:Default theme with text buttons for top menu and rounded corners on index and pop-up frames
StyleSheet.O3: AcornOliveTeal_2:AcornOliveTeal theme with icon buttons for top menu and rounded corners on index and pop-up frames
StyleSheet.O4: AcornOliveTeal_3:AcornOliveTeal theme with text buttons for top menu and rounded corners on index and pop-up frames
StyleSheet.O5: Blood_3:Blood theme with text buttons for top menu and rounded corners on index and pop-up frames
StyleSheet.O6: BlueDNA_3:BlueDNA theme with text buttons for top menu and rounded corners on index and pop-up frames
StyleSheet.O7: GreenLeaf_2:GreenLeaf theme with icon buttons for top menu and rounded corners on index and pop-up frames
StyleSheet.O8: GreenLeaf_3:GreenLeaf theme with text buttons for top menu and rounded corners on index and pop-up frames
StyleSheet.O9: OliveBranch_2:OliveBranch theme with icon buttons for top menu and rounded corners on index and pop-up frames
StyleSheet.O10: OliveBranch_3:OliveBranch theme with text buttons for top menu and rounded corners on index and pop-up frames
StyleSheet.O11: RoseTint_3:RoseTint theme with text buttons for top menu and rounded corners on index and pop-up frames
StyleSheet.T: Choose desired page theme using arrows. Hover over image for theme details

Volume.Desc: Each GenoMap's own 'Report Title' can be used to indicate a subset for output. This can be set on the 'GenoMaps' tab of the main GenoPro 'Properties' dialog (File/Properties when nothing selected). A subset is then all the GenoMaps with the same Report Title

ShowFlags.Desc: A-Attributes and Events, K-Kid's Pictures, E-Education, O-Occupations, P-Pedigree Chart, R-Relationships, S-Source/Citations, T-Custom Tags, W-Whereabouts

fHideFamilyDetails.Desc: Family details can appear on the 'individual' report pages. If hidden the entry is replaced by a link to the corresponding 'family' page.
fHideFamilyDetails.T: Suppress family details on Individual pages?

OnlyPrincipalSpouse.Desc: Normally the male is the 'principal spouse' here, but this can be changed by setting a Family Custom Tag 'PrincipalSpouse' to 1
OnlyPrincipalSpouse.T: If above option is not set, then only show family details for principal spouse?

Calendar.T: Show birthdays & marriage anniversaries on an Event Calendar?

ShowDescendantTreeIcon.T: Add link to 'Descendant Tree Chart' as icon after Individual name
ShowDescendantTreeIcon.Desc: Applies to individuals with DescendantTreeChart custom tag set. Actual charts are generated separately via the 'Descendant Tree Chart' report.

OptimizeUpload.T: Only re-upload support files on version change
OptimizeUpload.Desc: Theme files, Timeline and Google scripts not uploaded again if destination already has a report of the same version

VideoJs.T: Include 'video.js' plugin to provide 'Flash' fall-back for any .mp4 videos in your report
VideoJs.Desc: Only required if you have 'custom markup' adding .mp4 videos AND you want fallback. See 'www.videojs.com' for more

Book.Desc: Details of all individuals are produced as a single HTML page suitable for conversion to book format (e.g. PDF) for subsequent printing. !DO NOT USE FOR WEB REPORT!
Book.T: Produce 'Book' style Report instead of standard HTML Web Report

PageBreak.O1: LastName:on every change of last name
PageBreak.O2: FirstCharacter:only on change in first character of last name

ConvertToPDF.Desc: You need to download and install wkhtmltopdf in order to use this option.
ConvertToPDF.T: Run wkhtmltopdf to convert 'book' html file to PDF format.

wkhtmltopdfPath.T: Path to wkhtmltopdf.exe program used to create PDF output (Default {0})

CoverImage.T: Path to image to be used on cover page (optional, (requires wkhtmltopdf.exe)

TitleWrap.Desc: Text is wrapped at each space, to prevent a wrap at a space, use non-breaking space (To type this, hold Alt key, type 0160 on NUMERIC keypad, then release Alt key)
TitleWrap.T: Wrap the cover title text(requires wkhtmltopdf.exe)

PDFIntro.Desc: text is taken from the Description field under Generate Report 'Docment' tab

PDFHeader.T: 'wkhtmltopdf' command line parameters for PDF Header (Enter space to remove)

PDFFooter.T: 'wkhtmltopdf' command line parameters for PDF Footer (Enter space to remove)

PDFMargins.T: 'wkhtmltopdf' command line parameters for PDF Margins (Enter space to remove)

PDFOther.T: Other 'wkhtmltopdf' command line parameters for PDF, e.g. Zoom Width Height etc.

TitlePosition.O1: B:In banner at the bottom of the Heading pane
TitlePosition.O2: T:In banner at the top of the Heading pane
TitlePosition.O3: H:At the top of the Home page
TitlePosition.O4: C:In line with menu icons in a Heading pane with no banner image

fAutoHideTOC.Desc: Hide the Index frame on initial load and after each selection from it.

fJoinPlaceNames.Desc: Show place names as a comma separated list of all places in a hierarchy. This will be of use if you have named your places using single element names such as a town, rather than qualified names such as 'town, state, country'

fJoinSourceCitationNames.Desc: Show source and citation names as an @ separated list of all citations/sources in a hierarchy. This will be of use if you have named your sources using single element names such a book, rather than qualified names such 'book on shelf at library etc. Note that special action is taken if the source title is the same as the parent title, i.e. it is inherited. If the WhereInSource (or 'reference') tag is present it is assumed to be a citation of a source rather than the source itself. In this case the WhereInSource takes the place of the title, so the joined name becomes 'WhereInSource @ source title'.

fIndexChildPlacesAndSources.T: Show child Places and Sources in index separately as well as with parent

fCollapseNotes.T: Initially display all notes in 'collapsed' view?

fCollapseReferences.T: Initially display subsections & references in 'collapsed' view?

NestSourceRefs.Desc: Allow Source/Citations to be hidden under a collapse/expand subheading. If not checked then all will be visible as footnotss from single 'Source' fields and a list from the 'Sources' tab entries.'
NestSourceRefs.T: Put Source/Citation references in collapse/expand section

cTocExpand.Desc: determines whether or not tree indexes are initally displayed expanded or not. A value of -1 means always expand the index, 0 means never expand the index
cTocExpand.T: Item limit before indexes are shown in 'collapsed' view

ContactTitle.Desc: T= title, S= Summary(Tel, Fax, Email, Mob, Web), O= Occupancy Place, C= 1st line of Comment, I= Contact ID
ContactTitle.T: Field priority order for Contact Title

FrameBorder.Desc: N.B. If borders are not shown then frame sizes cannot be manually adjusted
FrameBorder.T: Show borders around frames making up each HTML page?

ForceFrames.Desc: Set to 'False' if using Acrobat Pro to create PDF versions of pages
ForceFrames.T: Force pages to be displayed within frameset

MaxPopup.T: Open 'popup' & index frames at maximum size, overlaying 'detail' frame

fAddGenericImage.Desc: Add a generic silhouette image for individuals with no associated picture
fAddGenericImage.T: Use silhouette image if no individual picture?

fShowPictureDetails.Desc: Show picture details phrase and any picture notes/description together with the picture on Individual & Family html pages. This information is always shown on the 'picture-[pictureid].htm' and 'pictures.htm' pages.
fShowPictureDetails.T: Show full picture information on Individual & Family pages?

fHidePictureName.Desc: Hide picture name tag, that GenoPro defaults to filename, normally shown under the pictures.

fUsePictureId.T: Use picture ID in place of picture title?

PictureSizeLarge.T: Larger picture size - Width x Height (pixels)

PictureSizeSmall.T: Smaller picture size - Width x Height (pixels)

ChildPictureSecondary.T: Use only 'secondary' picture as small 'child' picture instead of using primary picture?
ChildPictureSecondary.Desc: Allow use of a different picture for child image. Set Custom Tag 'Pictures.Secondary' to position of secondary picture in list of Individuals pictures.

ThumbnailCreate.Desc: Set to Y/yes to create resized pictures in the 'thumbnails' folder within the Report folder using IrfanView. Thumbnail size will be the same as the 'PictureSizeLarge' parameter value i.e by default 250x250. A dpi value of 72 is suggested. Thumbnails will also be produced for any Pictures to be displayed on the SVG or PDF GenoMap images, defined using the special Social Entity object. If set to No then you should also set 'Use picture thumbnails' in Picture Settings above to No
ThumbnailCreate.T: Create thumbnail images? N.B. requires IrfanView (http://www.irfanview.com/) to be installed

IrfanViewPath.T: Path to IrfanView program used to create picture thumbnails (Default {0})

ShowGallery.Desc: N.B. The gallery can take a long time to load. Thumbnails must be enabled if this is to be enabled.
ShowGallery.T: Generate Picture Gallery page in the report

GoogleMaps.Desc: The following four parameters can be overridden for particular Places by creating custom tags. Use the GenoPro Tools/Tag Editor to create a new Dialog Layout for Places named 'Mapping', set the description to '_Mapping' (N.B. The leading _ is important as it prevents these custom tags from being displayed as 'Place Additional Information' Under this Dialog Layout add 3 Custom tags: Map.Google.Zoom, Map.Google.Type, Map.Google.Width & Map.Google.Height. You can then use the '_Mapping' tab on Place Properties window to tailor these values for each Place.

GoogleMapsSmall.T: Size of Google Map when displayed inline & place has associated pictures - W x H (pixels)

GoogleMapsLarge.T: Size of Google Map when displayed inline & place has no associated pictures - W x H (pixels)

fGoogleMapsLink.Desc: Otherwise it is shown as a collapse/expand line in the place details popup page.
fGoogleMapsLink.T: Show place 'Google Map' in 'popup' frame via a hyperlink?

fGoogleMapsOverview.T: Provide 'Google Maps' link on Home page to map with all geocoded places?

Timelines.T: Display MIT Simile timelines for individuals, families & genomaps?

TimelineShowDuration.T: Show duration of events with colored bar?

TimelineContemporary.Desc: Duration bars can be extended to the Report date for events that are still current e.g. living people
TimelineContemporary.T: Show duration to report date for unterminated events?

TimelineWrapEvents.Desc: If unset then each line (or track) is used for only one event. N.B. events are added in reverse chronological order when wrapped, otherwise normal.
TimelineWrapEvents.T: Re-use 'tracks' for non-overlapping events on Individual & Family timelines?

TimelineWrapEventsMap.Desc: If unset then each line (or track) is used for only one event. N.B. events are added in reverse chronological order when wrapped, otherwise normal.
TimelineWrapEventsMap.T: Re-use 'tracks' for non-overlapping events on Genomap timelines?

TimelineMinEventsIndividual.T: Minimum no. of events before individual timeline is displayed

TimelineMinEventsFamily.T: Minimum no. of events before family timeline is displayed

GoogleAnalyticsAccount.Desc: Use this to add Google Analytics code when using your own website. (NOT familytrees.genopro.com)
GoogleAnalyticsAccount.T: Google Analytics: Your Account & sequence no. (UA-XXXXXXXX-Y)

GoogleAnalyticsDomain.T: Google Analytics: Your domain suffix if using multiple sub-domains

LangPossessiveLookup.T: Use NameDictionary to obtain possessive noun exceptional forms?

LangLocativeLookup.T: Use NameDictionary to obtain 'locative' noun exceptional forms?

LangBaseNameLookup.T: Use NameDictionary to obtain 'base' or 'root' form of names?

LangNames.T: To use NameDictionary to translate names to the Report Language, set this to Language Code to translate FROM.

LangPlace.T: To use NameDictionary to translate places to the Report Language, set this to Language Code to translate FROM.

LangOccupation.T: To use NameDictionary to translate occupations to the Report Language, set this to Language Code to translate FROM.

LangAlternative.T: Code for language to which 'alternative' name is to be translated via NameDictionary.

LangHtmlCulture.T: HTML 'Content-Language' subtype or 'dialect' e.g. 'us' to indicate 'en-us'

LangNameDictionary.T: NameDictionary file to be used for language translation and exceptional noun cases (Default {0})

LangShowOthers.T: Show other languages in multi-lingual fields

LangShowDefault.T: Default language for multi-lingual fields when no match with skin language

TextDirection.T: Force text direction to this value, overriding any value previously set

OriginalNamesCharts.T: Use original, untranslated names on Pedigree Chart

OriginalNamesTimelines.T: Use original, untranslated names on GenoMap Timelines

OriginalNamesGoogleMaps.T: Use original, untranslated place names for lookup on Google Maps

TagNameFull.T: Individual Tag to be used as the full name (used in indexes and headings)

TagNameFormal.T: Individual Tag to be used as the proper name (used in first line of narative)

TagNameKnownAs.T: Individual Tag to be used as the 'known as' name (displayed in first line of narrative)

TagNameShort.T: Individual Tag to be used as the 'common' name (used elsewhere in report)

TagNameAlternative.T: Individual Tag to be used as the 'alternative' name

ShowBaseNameOnly.T: Do not show name variations in index group entry

Svg.T: Include SVG Genomaps in the Report

fSvgZoomExtent.T: Show initial view of the SVG graphic as the whole of the GenoMap.

fSvgExpandFrame.T: Maximise the 'popup' SVG frame whenever it is opened.

ShowAllAges.T: Show age in gender symbol even if individual is still living?

ErrorCantLoadNameDictionary.T: Error: Unable to load contents of Name Dictionary

ErrorCoverImage.T: Failed to load PDF cover image

ErrorCustomDateTag.T: Error Custom Tag '{0}' is invalid as it is subordinate to a GenoPro Date field, Dates may be reported incorrectly.

ErrorCustomTag.T: Error Invalid Custom Tag '{0}' : tag names must start with a letter or an underscore.

ErrorCustomTagRename.T: Tag should be renamed using the Tag Editor e.g. '{0}' renamed to '{1}' or tag deleted if not required.

ErrorFetchHeader.T: Error: Unable to retrieve 'date last modified' from HTTP header for {0}

ErrorGenoMapBounds.T: Error: GenoMap '{0}' has no Boundary values set. Open that GenoMap to correct this.

ErrorHelpSvgNames1.T: Error: 'FmtHtmlHelpSvg' ConfigMsg tag does not contain the corect number of pairs (21)

ErrorHelpSvgNames2.T: Error: 'FmtHtmlHelpSvg' ConfigMsg tag does not contain the corect number of paired entries (21 x 2)

ErrorInkscapeNotFound.T: N.B. PDF images for GenoMaps will not be generated as the Inkscape package must be installed for this but Inkscape was not found on the path specified (or defaulted) in Config Parameter 'InkscapePath'

ErrorIrfanviewNotFound.T: N.B. Thumbnails for pictures and embedded pictures in GenoMaps will not be generated as the IrfanView package must be installed for this but IrfanView was not found on the path specified (or defaulted) in Config Parameter 'IrfanViewPath'

ErrorNoCachedSize.T: Error: No cached size information for {}

ErrorNoCustomSkin.T: Error: At present this Report can only be generated from a custom skin. Please use the 'New Skin' button above to create a custom version of this skin and run the Report again using it.

ErrorNoNameDictionary.T: Error: No NameDictionary.xml file for requested language options

ErrorPdfUpload.T: Error: Failed to write Pdf to Report Folder :

ErrorPicLabelDeprecated.T: Using label text 'picture="picnnnnn"' for pictures in Labels is now superseded. Please use Label/SocialEntity Primary Picture and Custom Tags 'Picture.Style', 'Picture.FixRatio' and 'Picture.FitLabel' instead of text in Label/Social Entity

ErrorPlaceLoop.T: Error: Place hierarchy too deep or looping

ErrorRegExpBroken.T: Error: ({0}: {1}) - VBScript is not installed correctly on your system. It is recommended that you download and install Windows Scripting 5.6 or 5.7 from http://www.microsoft.com/downloads

ErrorScriptingVersion.T: Error: This Report Skin requires Windows Script version 5.5 or above - Please install the latest version from the Microsoft Download Center.

ErrorSliderRange.T: Config.xml parameter 'PictureInterval' must be in range 1000 - 10000 (milliseconds)

ErrorSourceLoop.T: Error: Source/Citation hierarchy too deep or looping

ErrorTextSyntax.T: {0}: Invalid argument syntax for text format instruction: {1}

ErrorThumbnailCheck.T: Error: Unable to check if update required to thumbnail. File

ErrorXMLEntities.T:
Error: The following fields contain invalid XML entities i.e. in range � -  but excluding valid entities 	,
 and  Custom Tag data including Config Parameters in Document Tags will not be processed

ErrorXMLLoad.T: Error attempting to parse {3} data: {0} on line {1}: {2}

ErrorXMLParser.T: Error: Unable to load an ActiveX control for MS XML Parser. {0}:{1}

Errorwkhtmltopdf.T: Error: PDF Conversion requested but wkhtmltopdf.exe not found on path:

FmtInvalidPictureID.T: Picture ID {} in Label {} on GenoMap {} is invalid.

FmtPdfUpToDate.T: Pdf for GenoMap {} is already up to date.

FmtThumbnailUpToDate.T: Thumbnail for {0} is already up to date

HeaderConfigParameters.T: Click each subheading below to open or close that section. Make required changes to configuration parameters and then click 'Save changes'.

ParametersCancelHint.T: Exit this dialog and cancel report generation

ParametersOkHint.T: Exit this dialog and continue with report generation

ParametersAbandoned.T: Report generation cancelled by user during Configuration Parameters dialog

ParametersClearOption.T: To enable display of parameter settings, untick the box under 'Options' tab of this dialog.

ParametersLoadHint.T: Load saved parameters from selected profile

ParametersSaveHint.T: Save parameters values in named profile in the Registry

ParametersOverride.T: N.B. Display of Parameter Configuration Settings overridden by the 'ChangeParameters' Custom Tag. Clear this tag in order to use the setting from the 'Options' tab of this dialog.

ParametersSetOption.T: To disable display of parameter settings, tick the box under 'Options' tab of 'Generate Report' dialog.

ProfileValidNew.T: Choose an existing profile or new profile

SameTheme.T: Optimized Upload - Same Theme - Copying of theme files and images suppressed. See Config Params to override

SameVersion.T: Optimized Upload - Same Skin Version - Copying of Google Maps and Timeline support routines suppressed. See Config Params to override

WarningAutoHideMismatch.T: Warning: Autohide Index should be set when using Maximise Index/Popup option

WarningCustomTLayoutExcluded.T: Custom Tag Layout '{0}' is marked as system or private and has been excluded

WarningCustomTagExcluded.T: Custom Tag '{0}' in Layout '{1}' is marked as system or private and has been excluded

WarningEmptyNameDictionary.T: Warning: Language option selected but Name Dictionary has no entries.

WarningDicChange.T: Warning: [Dictionary Tag {1} has been replaced from version {!3} by ]Tag {0}[{?!1} [introduced at version {3} ]is missing from Dictionary and has been defaulted to '{2}]'

WarningTagChange.T: Warning: tag {0} introduced at version {2} is missing from Config.xml so defaulted to: {1}

WarningTitleMissing.T: Title Missing! Click on the "Document" tab to set a title to your genealogy report.

WarningUpgrade1.T: A later version of GenoPro is available

WarningUpgrade2.T: Please upgrade to ensure themes work correctly
